column1:
How are Listings useful on this Community?|

Our website provides the Listings feature to enable you to showcase and save your various listing items like: products
column13: using multiple tools for this. While adding your listing
column14:
choose the appropriate category and sub-category for your listing depending on your requirement.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
How can I create Listing?|

To create a listing
column2:
please follow the steps below:
1. Click “Listings” from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Go to “Post a New Listing” section.
3. Fill the basic details for your Listing
column3:
and add a photo for it.
4. When you are done

column1:
How can I add Photos to my Listing?|

You can add Photos to your Listing in one of the following ways:
1. To upload Photos
column2:
please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Listing Profile.    
b. Click “Photos” tab. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Photos”.
c. Click on “Add Photos” link from the top left corner of the “Photos” tab to add a photo.
d. Click the “Add Photos” link to select the photos from your hard-drive.
e. Once progress bar is completed
column3:
click on “Save Photos” to upload photos to your Listing.

2. From the “My Listings” section
column4:
click on the “Add Photos” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘e’ in case 1 above.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
How can I view my listings?|

To view all your Listings
column2:
please follow the steps below:
1. Click on “Listings” from the main navigation menu bar at the top of any page on this community.
2. Go to “My Listings” section.
3. This page will list all the Listings created by you.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
How can I review a Listing?|

To review a Listing
column2:
please follow the steps below:
1. Go to the Listing for which you want to add reviews.
2. Go to the “Reviews” tab for that Listing.
3. Click on “Post a Review” to write your review.
4. When you are completed with the Review

column1:
Who all can see my Listing?|

You can choose who all can see your Listing while creating your Listing
column2:
by choosing the appropriate option for the “Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Listing” link for your Listing.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
Who all can comment on my Listing?|

You can choose who all can comment your Listing while creating your Listing
column2:
by choosing the appropriate option for the “Comment Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Listing” link for your Listing.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
Who all can add Photos to my Listing?|

You can choose who all can add Photos to your Listing while creating your Listing
column2:
by choosing the appropriate option for the “Photo Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Listing” link for your Listing.

|Popular Features|Listings

column1:
Who all can add Videos to my Listing?|

You can choose who all can Videos to your Listing while creating your Listing
column2:
by choosing the appropriate option for the “Video Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Listing” link for your Listing.

column1:
My problem is not listed above. What should I do now?|

If your problem is not listed above
column2:
then please contact us by filling the “Contact Us” form using the “Contact” link available in the footer of our site. Let us know your problem and we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
